title: Bonus Episode: Return of the Ghosts
description:
In this episode, we have another spooky story to share. We talk to Victor Castro, a paranormal

investigator, about the two ghosts he encounters in his home. He also provides some expert

insight into Steve and Krista’s ghostly encounters from our “My Roommate, The Ghost” episode. 

To learn more about the podcast, go to: https://www.rocketmortgage.com/learn/podcast
author: info@pacific-content.com (Victor Castro)
